mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_tran ( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime
)values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime} )
mapper.select:
select
tran.id, user.name as owner, tran.money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, cus.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, act.name as activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime
from tbl_tran tran join tbl_user user on tran.owner=user.id join tbl_customer cus on tran.customerId=cus.id left join tbl_activity act on tran.activityId=act.id left join tbl_contacts con on tran.contactsId=con.id
where tran.id=#{id}

select
count(*) as value,stage as name
from tbl_tran
group by stage

select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, cus.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, con.fullname as contactsId
from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id join tbl_customer cus on t.customerId = cus.id
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and cus.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and con.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'
order by t.stage desc
limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}

select count(*)
from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id join tbl_customer cus on t.customerId = cus.id
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and cus.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and con.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'

select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.name, cus.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, con.fullname as contactsId
from tbl_tran t left join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id left join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id left join tbl_customer cus on t.customerId = cus.id
and u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and cus.name like '%' #{customerId} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and con.fullname like '%' #{contactsId} '%'

select
tran.id, tran.money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, cus.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, a.name as activityId, tran.source, con.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime
from tbl_tran tran join tbl_customer cus on cus.id = tran.customerId join tbl_contacts con on con.id = tran.contactsId join tbl_activity a on a.id = tran.activityId
where tran.id=#{id}

select
id, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, activityId, source, contactsId, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime
from tbl_tran
where id=#{id}

select
t.id, u.name as owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, t.stage, t.type
from tbl_tran t join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id
where contactsId=#{contactsId}
